movies.title: A Heavenly Gamble
movies.originalTitle: Auch Engel wollen nur das Eine
movies.plot: After an accident, a couple die and go to heaven. There they are informed they must go back to Earth and help some people.
movies.simplePlot: After an accident, a couple die and go to heaven. There they are informed they must go back to Earth and help some people.

biography.bio: Esther Schweins was born on April 18, 1970 in Oberhausen, Germany. She is an actress, known for Das Superweib (1996), Coup de fil (2007) and Mara and the Firebringer (2015).
biography.name: Esther Schweins

biography.bio: Thomas Heinze was born on March 30, 1964 in Berlin, Germany. He is an actor and producer, known for Der Wixxer (2004), Allein unter Frauen (1991) and Voyager (1991).
biography.name: Thomas Heinze

biography.bio: Steffen Groth was born on September 16, 1974 in Berlin, Germany. He is an actor and director, known for Go for Zucker (2004), Le vent de l'aventure (1999) and Ninja Assassin (2009).
biography.name: Steffen Groth

biography.bio: Anna Thalbach was born on June 1, 1973 in East Berlin, East Germany. She is an actress, known for Downfall (2004), A Dangerous Method (2011) and Carlos (2010).
biography.name: Anna Thalbach

biography.bio: Margret Völker was born on February 28, 1966 in Hamburg, West Germany. She is an actress, known for Harcèlement (2012), Double Pack (2000) and Le clan du bonheur (2000).
biography.name: Margret Völker

biography.bio: Severin Sonntag was born on December 21, 1995 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany. He is an actor, known for A Heavenly Gamble (2002), Ein Paradies für Pferde (2007) and Untreu (2004).
biography.name: Severin Sonntag

biography.bio: Tim Wilde was born on February 20, 1966 in Stralsund, German Democratic Republic. He is an actor, known for Qui peut sauver le Far West? (2001), Space Movie: La menace fantoche (2004) and Ossi's Eleven (2008).
biography.name: Tim Wilde

biography.bio: Edeltraud Schubert was born on April 23, 1917. She is an actress, known for Space Movie: La menace fantoche (2004), Grave Decisions (2006) and Falling for Art (2001).
biography.name: Edeltraud Schubert

biography.bio: Michael Habeck was born on April 23, 1944 in Grönenbach, Germany. He is known for his work on The Name of the Rose (1986), Rocks (2003) and The Bourne Identity (1988). He died on February 4, 2011 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Michael Habeck

biography.bio: Herbert Fux was born on March 25, 1927 in Hallein, Austria. He was an actor and writer, known for Der Bergdoktor (1992), Les trois mousquetaires (1993) and Woyzeck (1979). He was married to Edith. He died on March 13, 2007 in Zürich, Zürich, Switzerland.
biography.name: Herbert Fux

biography.bio: Johanna Bittenbinder was born on May 12, 1957 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany. She is an actress, known for The Dark Valley (2014), Sau Nummer vier. Ein Niederbayernkrimi (2010) and Grave Decisions (2006). She is married to Heinz-Josef Braun.
biography.name: Johanna Bittenbinder

biography.bio: Gregor Seberg was born on July 24, 1967 in Austria. He is an actor, known for SOKO Donau (2005), Smooth Operators (2011) and Faithy Y2K (1999).
biography.name: Gregor Seberg

biography.bio: Romana Pollak was born on July 22, 1971 in Vienna, Austria. She is an actress, known for Evilenko (2004), Scharf wie Chili (2005) and A Heavenly Gamble (2002).
biography.name: Romana Pollak

biography.bio: Stefan Weinert was born in 1964. He is an actor and director, known for Gloomy Sunday (1999), George and the Dragon (2004) and Binny and the Ghost (2013).
biography.name: Stefan Weinert

biography.bio: Martin Brambach was born in 1967 in Dresden, German Democratic Republic. He is an actor, known for The Lives of Others (2006), The Counterfeiters (2007) and Good Bye Lenin! (2003).
biography.name: Martin Brambach
